mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS user_id, USER_NICKNAME AS user_nickname, USER_IMAGE_URL AS user_image_url FROM USER_INFO ORDER BY USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME

SELECT P.POST_ID AS post_id, P.COMMUNITY_ID AS community_id, P.USER_ID AS user_id, P.POST_TITLE AS post_title, P.POST_TEXT AS post_text, P.POST_DATE AS post_date, PM.TRACK_ID AS track_id, PT.POST_TAG_TEXT AS post_tag_text, UI.USER_NICKNAME AS user_nickname, UI.USER_IMAGE_URL AS user_image_url FROM POST P LEFT JOIN POST_MUSIC PM ON PM.POST_ID = P.POST_ID LEFT JOIN POST_TAG PT ON PT.POST_TAG_ID = P.POST_TAG_ID LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI ON UI.USER_ID = P.USER_ID ORDER BY P.POST_TITLE, P.USER_ID, UI.USER_NICKNAME

SELECT F.FEED_ID AS FEED_ID, F.USER_ID AS USER_ID, F.FEED_TEXT AS FEED_TEXT, F.FEED_DATE AS FEED_DATE, FM.TRACK_ID AS TRACK_ID, FT.FEED_TAG_TEXT AS FEED_TAG_TEXT, UI.USER_NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME, UI.USER_IMAGE_URL AS USER_IMAGE_URL FROM FEED F LEFT JOIN FEED_MUSIC FM ON FM.FEED_ID = F.FEED_ID LEFT JOIN FEED_TAG FT ON FT.FEED_ID = F.FEED_ID LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI ON UI.USER_ID = F.USER_ID WHERE F.FEED_OPEN = 0 ORDER BY F.USER_ID, F.FEED_TEXT, UI.USER_NICKNAME
